TopicTitle: game crashes a lot without crashlog

Articles.Content:
My modded ksp crashes a lot lated, it usually happens on scene change and without crashlog

here's the output.log after a crash

https://www.dropbox.com/s/hdq81zqan79v5ur/output_log.txt?dl=0

plz someone help
I reallllllllllllly need help !!! it annoying

Hello.

Wow 7,62 MO of log! That's a big one. Before diving in this, just a question: Do you play with the 32bits .exe or the 64bits? Crashes and Return to desktop often happen when changing scene while playing the 32bits version with memory consumption mods.
